rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light, floor-to-ceiling windows for a seamless transition to the outdoors. The living area is adjacent and designed for comfort and social gatherings.

vastu.recommendations: Place the entrance in the east side to welcome positive energy.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony overlooking the garden. Designed for luxury with premium finishes.

vastu.recommendations: Ensure the head of the bed is aligned towards the north-east corner for optimum energy flow.

rooms.description: A well-appointed second bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and an attached balcony to provide fresh air and scenic views.

vastu.recommendations: Keep the door open or use soft curtains for a gentle flow of energy.

rooms.description: An integrated dining and kitchen area designed with modern appliances, ample counter space, and floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light. The layout encourages family interaction.

vastu.recommendations: Position the dining table in the south portion of the room to harness balanced energy.

rooms.description: A guest bathroom for visiting family and friends, paired with a small utility closet. The design includes natural lighting elements.

vastu.recommendations: Avoid placing water bodies or heavy fixtures directly opposite the entrance.

rooms.description: A spacious balcony adjacent to the master bedroom, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that offer a seamless indoor-outdoor experience. The design promotes relaxation and an open feel.

vastu.recommendations: Incorporate natural elements such as plants for better air quality.

rooms.description: A dedicated balcony adjoining the second bedroom, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows that open up to a scenic view of the surrounding landscape.

vastu.recommendations: Use light colors and natural textures to maintain positive energy.

rooms.description: An expansive open terrace area serving as a family lounge, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for panoramic views. Ideal for relaxation and outdoor gatherings.

vastu.recommendations: Utilize the space with plants and water features to balance energy.

rooms.description: A central corridor that connects all rooms, designed for ease of movement while maintaining privacy. Incorporates natural light through integrated skylights.

vastu.recommendations: Keep the corridor clutter-free and use reflective surfaces to enhance brightness.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows installed throughout the house to ensure ample natural light, energy efficiency, and a seamless connection with nature.
Modern sliding doors connecting indoor spaces to the outdoor balcony and terrace, ensuring easy access and a smooth flow between rooms.
Strategically placed skylights in central corridors to illuminate the space with natural daylight, enhancing the energy efficiency of the home.
